rules.natural: Whenever maintenance mode is enabled, a diagnostic is run on the system check.
If motion is detected from an intruder, then the system becomes operational under normal conditions.
In the event of a perimeter breach in the exterior zone, provided that motion is not detected from an intruder, it is not the case that the alarm sounds immediately.
Should a window be forced on the ground floor, then under the condition that motion is not detected from an intruder, the alarm does not sound immediately.
Either the main entry door is forced, or a perimeter breach happens in the exterior zone, or a window is forced on the ground floor.
Given that the network connection is secure, if the system is not operational under normal conditions, then the security camera is malfunctioning.
The network connection is secure, or the cellular backup is active.
If cloud storage is available, then a security event is data logged.
Cloud storage is available, or local storage is available.
Whenever encryption is enabled for the data stream, the security feed data is compromised.

Either encryption is enabled for the data stream, or if local storage is available, then provided that the cellular backup is active, under the condition that the system is not operational normally, the security camera malfunctions.

If tampering is detected on a sensor unit, then provided that it is not the case that if motion is not detected from an intruder, then a silent alarm is triggered, the police are not notified automatically.

Whenever a physical breach occurs at the control panel, then under the condition that it is not the case that if motion is not detected from an intruder, a silent alarm is triggered, it is not the case that the police are notified automatically.
If the vibration sensor is activated, then tampering is detected on a sensor unit.
The vibration sensor is activated, or the magnetic contact is disrupted.
Should the admin's fingerprint be verified, then the admin is authenticated successfully.
Either the admin's fingerprint is verified, or the admin's voiceprint is verified.
If the admin's voiceprint is verified, then a manual override is not initiated for an emergency.
Either authorized access is granted, or if the backup of the surveillance system is activated, an alert is sent to the security company.
Either the biometric scan is successful, or the keycard scan is successful.
If the keycard scan is successful, then the system is operational under normal conditions.
In the event that it is not the case that either the firewall is active on the network or the security feed data is not compromised, the system is isolated due to an emergency.
Should it be false that either the firewall is active on the network or the security feed data is not compromised, then it is not the case that the system is isolated due to an emergency.
Provided that it is not the case that if the magnetic contact is disrupted, then a physical breach occurs at the control panel, a manual override is initiated for an emergency.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if power is available from the main grid, then either the emergency override is activated or if the biometric scan is successful, the system is operational normally, maintenance mode is enabled.

If it is not the case that provided power is available from the main grid, either the emergency override is activated or if the biometric scan is successful, the system is operational normally, then it is not the case that a diagnostic is run on the system check.
Should it be false that if motion is not detected from an intruder, then a silent alarm is triggered, the police are notified automatically.
If it is false that under the condition that the system is not operational normally, the security camera malfunctions, then the backup of the surveillance system is activated.
Whenever it is not the case that if the system is not operational under normal conditions, the security camera is malfunctioning, it is not the case that an alert is sent to the security company.
If motion is not detected from an intruder, then the alarm sounds immediately.
Should motion not be detected from an intruder, then it is not the case that a silent alarm is triggered.

The main entry door is not forced.
It is not the case that a security event is data logged.
The firewall is not active on the network.
It is not the case that the admin is authenticated successfully.
The emergency override is not activated.

(A10 → A9).natural: Whenever maintenance mode is enabled, a diagnostic is run on the system check.

(A11 → G).natural: If motion is detected from an intruder, then the system becomes operational under normal conditions.

(A13 → (¬A11 → ¬A12)).natural: In the event of a perimeter breach in the exterior zone, provided that motion is not detected from an intruder, it is not the case that the alarm sounds immediately.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: Either a perimeter breach occurs in the exterior zone, or a window is forced on the ground floor.

(A14 → (¬A11 → ¬A12)).natural: Should a window be forced on the ground floor, then under the condition that motion is not detected from an intruder, the alarm does not sound immediately.

(A15 ∨ (A13 ∨ A14)).natural: Either the main entry door is forced, or a perimeter breach happens in the exterior zone, or a window is forced on the ground floor.

(A16 → (¬G → A1)).natural: Given that the network connection is secure, if the system is not operational under normal conditions, then the security camera is malfunctioning.

(A16 ∨ A17).natural: The network connection is secure, or the cellular backup is active.

(A17 → (¬G → A1)).natural: Provided that the cellular backup is active, whenever the system is not operational under normal conditions, the security camera experiences a malfunction.

(A18 ∨ (A17 → (¬G → A1))).natural: Either a security event is data logged, or if the cellular backup is active, then under the condition that the system is not operational normally, the security camera malfunctions.

(A19 → A18).natural: If cloud storage is available, then a security event is data logged.

(A19 ∨ A20).natural: Cloud storage is available, or local storage is available.

(A20 → (A17 → (¬G → A1))).natural: Under the condition that local storage is available, should the cellular backup be active, then if the system is not operational normally, the security camera malfunctions.

(A21 → A22).natural: Whenever encryption is enabled for the data stream, the security feed data is compromised.

(A21 ∨ (A20 → (A17 → (¬G → A1)))).natural: Either encryption is enabled for the data stream, or if local storage is available, then provided that the cellular backup is active, under the condition that the system is not operational normally, the security camera malfunctions.

(A23 ∨ ¬A22).natural: The firewall is active on the network, or it is not the case that the security feed data is compromised.

(A27 → (¬(¬A11 → A25) → ¬A26)).natural: If tampering is detected on a sensor unit, then provided that it is not the case that if motion is not detected from an intruder, then a silent alarm is triggered, the police are not notified automatically.

(A27 ∨ A28).natural: Either tampering is detected on a sensor unit, or a physical breach occurs at the control panel.

(A28 → (¬(¬A11 → A25) → ¬A26)).natural: Whenever a physical breach occurs at the control panel, then under the condition that it is not the case that if motion is not detected from an intruder, a silent alarm is triggered, it is not the case that the police are notified automatically.

(A29 → A27).natural: If the vibration sensor is activated, then tampering is detected on a sensor unit.

(A29 ∨ A30).natural: The vibration sensor is activated, or the magnetic contact is disrupted.

(A3 → A2).natural: Provided that the backup of the surveillance system is activated, an alert is sent to the security company.

(A30 → A28).natural: If the magnetic contact is disrupted, then a physical breach occurs at the control panel.

(A32 ∨ ¬A31).natural: Either the admin is authenticated successfully, or it is not the case that a manual override is initiated for an emergency.

(A33 → A32).natural: Should the admin's fingerprint be verified, then the admin is authenticated successfully.

(A33 ∨ A34).natural: Either the admin's fingerprint is verified, or the admin's voiceprint is verified.

(A34 → ¬A31).natural: If the admin's voiceprint is verified, then a manual override is not initiated for an emergency.

(A4 ∨ (A3 → A2)).natural: Either authorized access is granted, or if the backup of the surveillance system is activated, an alert is sent to the security company.

(A5 → G).natural: Provided that the biometric scan is successful, the system becomes operational under normal conditions.

(A5 ∨ A6).natural: Either the biometric scan is successful, or the keycard scan is successful.

(A6 → G).natural: If the keycard scan is successful, then the system is operational under normal conditions.

(A7 ∨ (A5 → G)).natural: The emergency override is activated, or if the biometric scan is successful, the system is operational normally.

(A8 → (A7 ∨ (A5 → G))).natural: Given that power is available from the main grid, either the emergency override is activated, or if the biometric scan is successful, the system is operational under normal conditions.

(¬(A23 ∨ ¬A22) → A24).natural: In the event that it is not the case that either the firewall is active on the network or the security feed data is not compromised, the system is isolated due to an emergency.

(¬(A23 ∨ ¬A22) → ¬A24).natural: Should it be false that either the firewall is active on the network or the security feed data is not compromised, then it is not the case that the system is isolated due to an emergency.

(¬(A30 → A28) → A31).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the magnetic contact is disrupted, then a physical breach occurs at the control panel, a manual override is initiated for an emergency.

(¬(A8 → (A7 ∨ (A5 → G))) → A10).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that if power is available from the main grid, then either the emergency override is activated or if the biometric scan is successful, the system is operational normally, maintenance mode is enabled.

(¬(A8 → (A7 ∨ (A5 → G))) → A9).natural: Whenever it is false that if power is available from the main grid, then either the emergency override is activated or if the biometric scan is successful, the system is operational normally, a diagnostic is run on the system check.

(¬(A8 → (A7 ∨ (A5 → G))) → ¬A9).natural: If it is not the case that provided power is available from the main grid, either the emergency override is activated or if the biometric scan is successful, the system is operational normally, then it is not the case that a diagnostic is run on the system check.

(¬(¬A11 → A25) → A26).natural: Should it be false that if motion is not detected from an intruder, then a silent alarm is triggered, the police are notified automatically.

(¬(¬A11 → A25) → ¬A26).natural: In the event that it is not the case that if motion is not detected from an intruder, a silent alarm is triggered, then it is not the case that the police are notified automatically.

(¬(¬G → A1) → A2).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the system is not operational normally, then the security camera is malfunctioning, an alert is sent to the security company.

(¬(¬G → A1) → A3).natural: If it is false that under the condition that the system is not operational normally, the security camera malfunctions, then the backup of the surveillance system is activated.

(¬(¬G → A1) → ¬A2).natural: Whenever it is not the case that if the system is not operational under normal conditions, the security camera is malfunctioning, it is not the case that an alert is sent to the security company.

(¬A11 → A12).natural: If motion is not detected from an intruder, then the alarm sounds immediately.

(¬A11 → A25).natural: Provided that motion is not detected from an intruder, a silent alarm is triggered.

(¬A11 → ¬A12).natural: Under the condition that motion is not detected from an intruder, it is not the case that the alarm sounds immediately.

(¬A11 → ¬A25).natural: Should motion not be detected from an intruder, then it is not the case that a silent alarm is triggered.

(¬G → A1).natural: If the system is not operational under normal conditions, then the security camera is malfunctioning.
